alert.note: Alert for Eastern Monmouth; Middlesex; Western Monmouth (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Watch issued December 20 at 3:20PM EST until December 23 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...One to two feet of inundation above ground level is possible in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Tidal areas in the counties of Middlesex and Monmouth. * WHEN...From late Thursday night through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At this level, widespread roadway flooding occurs in coastal and bayside communities and along inland tidal waterways. Many roads become impassable. Some damage to vulnerable structures may begin to occur. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Arthur Kill at Perth Amboy MLLW Categories - Minor 7.2 ft, Moderate 8.2 ft, Major 9.2 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 20/05 PM 5.2 -0.5 0.6 None 21/06 AM 6.3 0.6 0.4 None 21/06 PM 5.2 -0.5 0.4 None 22/06 AM 6.4 0.7 0.1 None 22/07 PM 6.0 0.3 1.0 None 23/07 AM 8.7 3.0 2.2 Moderate Sandy Hook Bay at Sandy Hook MLLW Categories - Minor 6.7 ft, Moderate 7.7 ft, Major 8.7 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 20/05 PM 4.6 -0.6 0.4 None 21/06 AM 5.7 0.5 0.2 None 21/06 PM 4.7 -0.5 0.3 None 22/06 AM 5.8 0.6 0.0 None 22/07 PM 5.4 0.2 0.8 None 23/07 AM 8.0 2.8 2.0 Moderate Watson Creek at Manasquan MLLW Categories - Minor 5.7 ft, Moderate 6.7 ft, Major 7.7 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.3 ft, Moderate 2.3 ft, Major 3.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 20/05 PM 3.8 -0.6 0.0 None 21/05 AM 5.1 0.7 0.1 None 21/06 PM 4.1 -0.3 0.1 None 22/06 AM 5.3 0.9 0.0 None 22/07 PM 4.5 0.1 0.4 None 23/07 AM 6.9 2.5 1.5 Moderate &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
